section.title: retail sites for Retail Sites
section.para: Retail Sites are not limited to store fronts, but may include warehouses, corporate offices, or any location you wish to manage and maintain individually. To configure Retail Sites, select the "Retail Sites" option. The following screen will appear:

note.para: The ability to maintain multiple Retail Sites is only available in the commercial editions of xTuple ERP.

section.para: When viewing the list of Retail Sites, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Display lists Retail Sites defined for your installation.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
Opens screen for creating a new Retail Site.

Enables you to edit highlighted Retail Sites. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Retail Site—except that when editing, the fields will contain Retail Site information. Double-clicking on a Retail Site will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a Retail Site and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a Retail Site and then select this button to remove the Retail Site from the list.
